g.text: previous steps omitted, see previous diagram(US008_SD_Part1)
[If waiting list stil has a SNS user unless the nurse asks to stop]
[if SNS user has a scheduled vaccination appointment]
shows SNS user information(name, age and adverse reactions .)
[if it's SNS user first administration of this vaccine]
(Controller gets a string contationg the vaccine information)
shows vaccine information(Name and dosage) and requests data(Lot number)
(Controller saves the VaccinationAdministrationRecord in the vaccination facility.
May or may not create a vaccine card too)
(Controller creates a timer to send a SMS)
